mapper.update: update opening_requirements set level_title = #{levelTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_description = #{levelDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_video_verify = #{hasVideoVerify,jdbcType=BIT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, video_verify_status = #{videoVerifyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opening_requirement_id = #{openingRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, level_title, level_description, pay_channel_id, has_video_verify, level, video_verify_status, opening_requirement_id from opening_requirements where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
